citations.desc: ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at approximately
3:30 pm on 09/29/2014.
The inspector knocked on the facility door and called the contact numbers provided by the license holder. All
attempts to contact the license holder were unsuccessful.
A responsible person shall be available to accompany inspection.
Note: This inspection report was sent by certified and regular mail.

narrative:
2.126(b)                    REPEAT
ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at approximately
3:30 pm on 09/29/2014.
The inspector knocked on the facility door and called the contact numbers provided by the license holder.  All
attempts to contact the license holder were unsuccessful.  
A responsible person shall be available to accompany inspection.
Note: This inspection report was sent by certified and regular mail.
